text: Joanna Jędrzejczyk (born 18 August 1987) is a Polish mixed martial artist and former Muay Thai kickboxer. She competes in the women's flyweight and women's strawweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). She is a former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion, reigning for 966 days in total. She has an MMA record of 16 wins and four losses. Her kickboxing record is 27 wins and three losses. Jędrzejczyk was born in Olsztyn. She has a twin sister, Katarzyna. She is a Catholic. ==References== ==Other websites== *UFC profile Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Kickboxers Category:Mixed martial artists Category:Polish Roman Catholics Category:Polish sportspeople Category:Twin people
title: Joanna Jędrzejczyk
